Schedule

Schedule for Math 58B, Introduction to Biostatistics, Spring 2022

Heres your roadmap for the semester! Each week, follow the general process outlined below:

  • Before class on Tuesday, read the suggested article

  • Enjoy the notes / readings

  • Attend class, review the warm-up if you have any questions after completing it during class.

  • Complete the Lab and HW assignments

    • Lab due every Tuesday by 11:59pm
    • HW due every Thursday by 11:59pm

  • Discuss the reflection questions and ethics considerations (see class notes) with your classmates, mentor, and professor

  • IMS: Introduction to Modern Statistics by etinkaya-Rundel and Hardin, https://openintro-ims.netlify.app/.

  • ISCAM: Investigating Statistics, Concepts, Applications, and Methods by Chance and Rossman http://www.rossmanchance.com/iscam3/. Many of the examples come from ISCAM, a pdf of which can be purchased for $5.

    • ISCAM applets
date topic agenda readings article (Tues) assignments

Corrections

If you see mistakes or want to suggest changes, please create an issue on the source repository.

Reuse

Text and figures are licensed under Creative Commons Attribution CC BY 4.0. Source code is available at https://github.com/hardin47/m58-intro-stats, unless otherwise noted. The figures that have been reused from other sources don't fall under this license and can be recognized by a note in their caption: "Figure from ...".
